title: RemoveGroupMember (Method)
text:
METHOD RemoveGroupMember : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Removes a group member (given by a BACnet-Object-Reference) and a group member name at index nIndex from the Group_Members-Property and the
Group_Member_Names-Property of this BACnet-Object. Both the group member and its group member name are removed simulatenously by this function.

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index of the subordinate to remove.
